  • Class
    Description
    GuiReprEmbeddedComponent
    a GUI component for a property holding a JComponent
    GuiReprEmbeddedComponent.ComponentNone
    a dummy component class for representing no updating.
    GuiReprValueDocumentEditor
    a GUI representation for a property holding a Document, AbstractDocument.Content, or a StringBuilder.
    GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.ContentInsertEdit
    an undoable insertion operation for GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.StringBuilderContent
    GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.ContentPosition
    a position implementation with an offset
    GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.ContentRemoveEdit
    an undoable removing operation for GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.StringBuilderContent
    GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.ContentWrappingDocument
    a styled-document impl.
    GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.EditSupplier<T>
    an functional interface used in GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.StringBuilderContent
    GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.StringBuilderContent
    a content for StringBuilder: wraps a buffer and manages any changes to the buffer.
    GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.UndoContentPosition
    a saved position for GuiReprValueDocumentEditor.ContentPosition.
    GuiReprValueImagePane
    a GUI representation for a property holding an Image.
    GuiReprValueImagePane.ImageHistoryEntry
    a special value of history entry which has an image and it's source file path
    GuiReprValueImagePane.ImageSizeGetter
    an ImageObserver for obtaining the size of an image
